Room.Name: Rutger Castle Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are just south of the intersection with Hafnia Mountain Road.
Room.LongDescription: Prince Rutger and his royal family have a mountain castle to the southeast. You can see it from here, if you tilt your head back and look high on the east mountian face. The road you are on winds through several passes to go there. Just to the south there is grove of trees which the roads skirts.
